comments:
After updating to the latest version on 12/5/7 and at the same time switching back to Java 5, I got the following error trying to start STEM  .  I tried doing a clean of all projects and cleared the workspace but the error remains. I found that if I switched to back to Java 6 it works.

I don't see any indication of which classfile it is having problems with but MapView seems to be the last ohf.stem file in the stacktrace.

The problem was the switching from Java 6 back to Java 5.  One can not simply change the "installed JRE" and rebuild.  There are other preferences like Java Compiler level that also need to be changed.
